doc.previous: The ethnic makeup of the Bahamas is African 85 European 12 Asian and Latin Americans 3 5 Given intermarriage and interracial unions over the centuries most families have branches and even immediate family members spanning the entire spectrum of skin color among light brown and unequivocally dark 56 This reflects the many degrees of African and European ancestry over centuries of mixed race unions
doc.after: Afro Bahamians are Bahamian nationals whose primary ancestry was based in West Africa The first Africans to arrive to The Bahamas were freed slaves from Bermuda they arrived with the Eleutheran Adventurers looking for new lives
